origin.origDate: 1730 at the latest. 1750 according to Cabaton (1912, p. 41).

provenance.p: It appears to be the maha Bāratam qui traite de l'histoire de Darmaraïen and the paper Maha Baratam sent by the Jesuits of the Mission du Carnate in 1730 for the library of the king of France and mentioned in ancien lists (BnF NAF 5442, f5v and f9r).

S.n. (1739). Catalogus codicum manuscriptorum Bibliothecae regiae. Tomus primus. Pars prima, complectens codices manuscriptos orientales. Paris: Typographia Regia. — See p. 435.
